overview: JP Gan is a Managing Director of Qiming. He has over ten years of experience in investment and finance. Prior to joining Qiming, he was the Chief Financial Officer of KongZhong Corporation (NASDAQ: KONG), a leading wireless internet company in China. Prior to KongZhong, Mr. Gan spent five years at The Carlyle Group and was a Director responsible for venture and growth capital investments in China. Mr. Gan also worked as an investment banker at Merrill Lynch and as a consultant at then-Price Waterhouse.

degrees.institution: University of Chicago Graduate School of Business
